text: Acalypha is a botanical genus that is from the family Euphorbiaceae. == Synonym == * Acalyphes Hassk. * Acalyphopsis Pax & K.Hoffm. * Calyptrospatha Klotzsch ex Baill. * Caturus L. * Corythea S.Watson * Cupameni Adans. * Galurus Spreng. * Gymnalypha Griseb. * Linostachys Klotzsch ex Schltdl. * Mercuriastrum Fabr. * Odonteilema Turcz. * Paracelsea Zoll. * Ricinocarpus Kuntze * Schizogyne Ehrenb. ex Pax * Usteria Dennst == Classification == System Classification Reference Linne Monoecia class, order Monadelphia Species plantarum (1753) Category:Euphorbiaceae
title: Acalypha
